resources.string: Neotech Development is an international software development company with several offices around the world (Tallinn, Estonia | Riga, Latvia | St. Petersburg, Russia | Florida, USA | Minsk, Belarus). We are a team of highly skilled, engaged and passionate about software development IT professionals. Our goal is creating a software product of upmost quality by using cutting-edge technologies and solutions.
Our Minsk office is located in the Alexandr Passaz business plaza. Near the office area we have a National Library and Metro station. Infront of the plaza there is free parking.
Akmeņu iela 14, Rīga, LV-1048, Latvia Registration number: 40103947559 Phone number: +371 6690 1753 E-mail: info@neotech.lv

Our office is located in the heart of Tallinn. From our windows you can see perfect view to historical and unique Old Town. It brings you a feeling of being a part of it. Tallinn office is located in a modern building with own gym on the 4-th floor and a massage armchair right around the corner of the open space you will work at.
Our office is located in a historical centre of Saint-Petersburg in Atlantic city plaza. A beautiful and perfect view opens from this building to the Baltic sea and green park of Saint -Petersburg.
Our office in Florida located in a modern business plaza with a perfect view to the shore of Atlantic ocean. Near the office there are a lot of different nice places and restaurants.
